name: OrganismsCombinationTestsByCultureAndIdentification
title: Organisms (Combination Tests by Culture and Identification)
description: Contains codes only applicable to Encephalitis-causing organisms.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names that may be ordered or ‘observed’ for detection and identification of more than one organism in a clinical specimen.),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: Combination Tests by Culture and Identification.),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
